text: India's men's national under-19 cricket team represents the country in cricket at Under-19 level. The team has won the Under-19 World Cup five times and finished runners-up four times. In 2000, they won it under the captaincy of Mohammad Kaif, in 2008, they won it under Virat Kohli's leadership, in 2012 under Unmukt Chand, in 2018 under Prithvi Shaw, and in 2022 under Yash Dhull. ==Tournament results== A red box around the year indicates tournaments played within India Key Champions Runners-up Semi-finals ===ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup === India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record India U19 Cricket World Cup record Year Result 1988 Group Stage 6th 8 7 3 4 0 0 1998 Second Round 5th 16 6 4 2 0 0 2000 Champions 1st 16 8 7 0 1 0 2002 Semi-finals 3rd 16 7 4 3 0 0 2004 Semi-finals 3rd 16 7 5 2 0 0 2006 Runners-up 2nd 16 6 5 1 0 0 2008 Champions 1st 16 6 6 0 0 0 2010 Quartar-finals 6th 16 6 3 3 0 0 2012 Champions 1st 16 6 5 1 0 0 2014 Quarter-finals 5th 16 6 5 1 0 0 2016 Runners-up 2nd 16 6 5 1 0 0 2018 Champions 1st 16 6 6 0 0 0 2020 Runners-up 2nd 16 6 5 1 0 0 2022 Champions 1st 16 6 6 0 0 0 2024 Runners-up 2nd 16 7 6 1 0 0 2026 To be determined Total 5 titles 96 75 20 0 1 ===ACC Under-19 Asia Cup === India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record India U19 Asia Cup record Year Result 1989 Champions 1st 3 3 3 0 0 0 2003 Champions 1st 4 4 3 1 0 0 2012 Champions 1st 8 5 3 1 1 0 2014 Champions 1st 8 5 4 1 0 0 2016 Champions 1st 8 4 4 0 0 0 2017 Group Stage 5th 8 3 1 2 0 0 2018 Champions 1st 8 4 4 0 0 0 2019 Champions 1st 8 5 4 1 0 0 2021 Champions 1st 8 5 4 1 0 0 2023 Semi- Finals 4th 8 4 2 2 0 0 2024 Runners-up 2nd 8 5 3 2 0 0 Total 8 titles 47 35 11 1 0 ==References== Category:Cricket teams in India Category:Men's national cricket teams
